name: PUSH THE BUTTON!
description:
This was just a prototype put together to test GUI-buttons and state saving in GML...
It, uh, grew into this horrific blob thats forever stuck in a limbo between in-joke and test-bed.

Is it worthy of Itch.io? Eeeeehhhh, Probably not. But, hey, all you've got to do is PUSH THE BUTTON (TO WIN THE GAME)!

Featuring:
  1. Two different voices!
  2. Like 5 diffrent buttons! Some of them actually work!
  3. Secrets(tm)!
  4. A critical lack of effort!

Made in GameMaker Studio.
Additional voice lines provided by remleiz (https://www.youtube.com/user/remleiz)
